projects.title: TMF Beat Challenge Website
projects.description: That My Favorite (TMF) Beat Challenge challenges producers to create an original composition in a mere 48 hours, all the while weaving in required elements. The TMF Beat website serves as a repository for past contests and the beats that were produced for them, allowing users easy access and listening to a wide array of original music. The website also houses the voting server, which allows users to cast secure votes on their favorite beats in a certain time frame, with a winner selected upon the vote's end.

projects.title: Silva
projects.description: Silva is a small-scale massively multiplayer online game with an authoritative master server. Players can create characters tied to accounts and join virtual worlds with other players, whether it be for chatting and emoting or battling against and alongside others.

projects.title: claq
projects.description: Claq is an online typing test built for the Keebs Club at the University of California Irvine. Users can test their typing speed in a highly customizable environment, controlling everything from the test style and difficulty to the look and feel of the website.

projects.title: RPS Tourney
projects.description:
RPS Tourney is a minimal Rock Paper Scissors tournament web game, with a ReactJS client and an Express, Socket.js powered Node serverside, deployed on Heroku.

The full stack application has a minimal interface, and is easy to use for all players. Creating or joining lobbies is as simple as entering a unique lobby name & lobby-unique name.

Once in a lobby, a tournament is started between players, with randomly created bracketing tiers that automatically scale based on the present number of players, odd or even. Players who win their best of 3, 1v1 game advance to the next set, until only 2 remain, the winner of which is decided in a best of 5.

projects.title: Holly
projects.description: Holly is a fully autonomous service that generates musical remixes and uploads them to YouTube. Following the "Slowed + Reverb" style, Holly will find fitting music, apply numerous filters and effects to the audio, render a video, generate video metadata, and upload the finished product. So far, Holly as acrued 850,000+ views and 600+ subscribers.
